Игра как по мне стоит покупки, ведь она достаточно уникальна(Кроме Пятницы похожих не припомню),разнообразна-тут огромное кол-во ресонажей по обе стороны и у вас уйдёт много времени чтобы найти любимчика и "свои" перки,так ещё и прошло уже 4 года,а её всё пилят,выпускают DLC, фиксят баги(иногда создают их). 
 Конечно проблем тут достаточно:удары на огромном расстоянии, топоры Ани пробивают стены, токсичное комьюнити, читеры(за 180 часов их видел лишь пару раз,но они есть),но на фоне Пятницы которую забросили разработчики(и я тоже забросил) она выглядит значительно лучше.

В целом игра интересная если рассматривать ее не как игру для постоянного задротства, а как игру с конечной целью которую вы можете сами себе поставить и достигнуть ее. 
Моей целью было взять первый ранг на убийце, чего в принципе достигнуть не так и сложно взяв определенный набор перков и аддонов и более менее играбельного убийцу. 
За сторону выживших писать не буду, т.к. 95% времени я играл на маньяке, мне была не интересна сторона выживших. 
По самой игре: 
1)Геймплей - простой и не разнообразный, нет разных режимов все просто как 2 копейки 
(выжившие чинят генераторы - убийца их ловит) 
Повторение одного и того же из игры в игру надоедает.
2) Неиграбельность некоторых классов маньяков или сложность их освоения ( ну тут как говориться если вам интересно играть в эту игру 500+ часов, то можно выучить всех и вся, но как по мне зачем изобретать велосипед если есть имба-комбинации взяв которые можно разносить и дискорд пачки сурвов).
3) Многие жалуются на "токсичное" комьюнити игры, но мне как стороне играющей за убийцу это было даже забавно когда четверо выживальщиков упорно говорили мне как нужно играть следуя каким-то мифическим правилам :D
4) Нет баланса. (Приготовьтесь что на 15 ранге вам будут давать 5-1 ранг. Увы и ах, привыкайте).

Вывод: Игра возможно может очень сильно затянуть, если играть в нее с компанией. А если вы, как и я любите в одиночку играть и сами ставить себе цели от игры, не особо обращая внимания на мнение окружающих, то для вас это будет своего рода поход в зоопарк.
haha chase the funny survivor and go bonk! :)

Though I had to find an alternative way to play (due to lack of compatibility with my Mac), I can safely say I've been enjoying playing. The game is a very fun experience, and is even more enjoyable when you have a few friends to tag along with. Even if they may get frustrated with you for not having their level of expertise! I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for an intense, multiplayer game filled with elements of strategy and horror wrapped up in a fun little package. I've enjoyed playing this both alone and with friends, and look forward to dedicating a few more hours of my life to it. Hopefully I'll be able to afford a computer that can actually run it without needing to use a streaming service sometime soon. :)

DONT BUY THIS GAME IF YOU ARE GOING TO PLAY ALONE.

This game highly incentives a killer to play as toxic as possible. As someone who play both as survivor and killer alike, I understand the difficulty from both sides, AND I know how unjust this game is. Killers have OP perks and addons that are incentivized by the game to be used. Like "Barbecue and Chili" it’s a perk that you can see all survivors’ auras for 4 seconds when you hook someone and its use is incentivized by given the killer more XP for each player hooked. I’m not gonna mention everything because that would be an immense list of things. Survivors can be "tunneled" (when a killer focus only on you to hook you 3 times in a row) and "face camped" (when the killer hooks you and stays by your side to watch you die and prevent your save) by the killer without any punishment to him, and you can’t even quit cause the game REWARDS the toxic killer for you quitting your game, this can only be countered if you are playing with at least 2 more friends, so you can communicate. But unfortunately, this GAME has no communication, if you are playing alone, you are most likely dead, no matter what OP perk you are using as a survivor.

Yeah, it’s bad when survivors quit your game. But I've only saw survivors quitting because they fell victim to a toxic killer. To worsen it a little more, killers have an item called "Ebony Mori"  that he can kill every survivor in the game who have been hooked once, to make your pathetic attempt to play a fun game super frustrating, and survivors receive far less compensation for every trouble than the killer, also its almost impossible for a survivor playing alone doing everything alone in the game to receive all iridescent shards.

Statistically it’s rare to see a team of 4 strangers surviving and walking it of together. Its most likely that only one or two can escape. Playing as "The executioner" the only times someone could escape me, was because I was letting them farm or I killed everyone but one and he escaped through the hatch.

I feel shame playing as some killers because of how unjust the game is, and they say its "the gameplay", let me tell you. NO IT IS NOT. YOU CAN'T PLAY GOOD WITH YOUR FAVORITE KILLER BECAUSE IT WAS NERFED, YOU ARE JUST BAD... First off you only won with him because he was too OP and it felt good, didn't it? After all you are a piece of toxic humanity who just think it’s fun to see others raging, but when it’s you who fall victim to a toxic player you rage quit and refuse to admit this game incentives this kind of action.

I'm amazed how this game doesn’t do anything to make it more equilibrated and enjoyable for both parties.
But if you are playing with friends it’s almost a great game, after all you can communicate making the game a little bit more playable.

(I’m over 18, have a job, working on 3D Animation, Software Development and know how to program a game C#, C++. I know how to criticize a good game with some flaws)

The game takes some getting used to, but once you get into it, it's really fun. The game is always best with friends and without too much tryharding. Keep in mind that the game is hard to enjoy a lot if you don't put time and potentially money into it as there are a lot of dlc's that a lot of people consider vital to either side of play.
So be friendly, spin around while you're dying, maybe let someone go if they did well.
